#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define REP(i, n)	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define REPN(i, n)	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)

#define MAX			1050
#define INF			(1LL << 50LL)

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll A[MAX], n, m, k;

int main(){
	int tc;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	while(tc--){
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &n, &m, &k);
		REPN(i, n) scanf("%lld", &A[i]);
		sort(A+1, A+n+1);
		A[n+1] = k;
		ll ret = INF;
		for(int i=1;i<=n+1;i++) ret = min(ret, m * (A[i] - A[i-1]));
		printf("%lld\n", ret);
	}
	return 0;
}
